caption: Simplified e-graph for the abstract transition system of array\_copy. Dotted lines represent equality classes, or \emph{e-classes}, where each term in the box is equal. In the example, $0$, $z$, and $i_0$ are all equal, so they are in the same e-class. Function terms are represented by arrows from function heads to arguments. The program term $\SelectAbs(a_0, i_0)$ is represented by the e-class in the top right-hand corner of the figure.
